notes: Many can trap you from all directions (making you unable to escape and eventually killing you) and you may not even notice until it is too late because they could be invisible.
sounds: Don't you feel a bit ... buggy?!
My father was a year 2k bug.
name: Tibia Bug
location: Appeared in the [[Thais Raids#Primitive raid on Thais|Primitive raids]], during [[Tibia's 10th Anniversary]].
strategy: Try to find the real Tibia Bug and kill it.
